attributes.action: Enable every busy road has Traffic Lights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Say if you are crossing a busy road without a lollypop lady or something, you will not know when to cross and will therefore risk your life. If you have kids you can encourage them to look at the red and green people and tell you when to cross. But if there was no Traffic Lights they could easily get bored and run straight in the middle of the road..... and that would be the end of them and we're sure nobody would like that.
